songs.title: I cheated
songs.lyrics:
Oh G-dragon (A yo Great Park! 뭐해요?)
딱히 (오늘 파티 있는데 같이 갈래요?)
책임질 거야? (Yeah)
한 번 놀아볼까? (Yeah) 출바알~

오늘 밤 나 바람났어 친구 따라 강남 갔어
여름도 다가왔으니 왕자가 돌아왔어
나도 제대로 바람났어 놀고 싶어 안달 났어
열광의 도가니 신 나는 분위기 우린 지금 야단났어
난 바람났어
난 바람났어

미미 미안해 엄마 용서해 엄마
오늘 밤 전화 다 꺼 I’m on fire
우린 좀 바빠 hey 민서 아빠
웃어봐 하하하 하하하 허파에 바람 찼어 huh
난 바람났어
난 바람났어

오늘 같은 saturday night (saturday night)
미친듯이 노는 거야 (uh-huh!)
Oh baby oh oh baby (yeah)
바람아 더 불어다오 내게로
한 여름의 party tonight 뛰어 높이 가는 거야
Oh baby oh oh baby 하늘을 날자

Let’s go let’s go let’s go let’s go let’s go come on!
오늘 밤 또 바람 났어 친구 따라 강북 갔어
UV 넌 이태원 갔어? 우리 둘은 홍대에 왔어
발바닥에 불이 났어 정신 나간 우리라서
나 오랜만에 물 만났어 물고긴 줄 알았어
매력이 넘쳐 스타일 멋져 Swag Swag
동해도 번쩍 서해도 번쩍
이런 남자들 만나봤어? Swag~ 우린 바람났어
우린 바람났어
우린 바람났어
우린 바람났어

오늘 같은 saturday night (saturday night)
미친듯이 노는 거야 (uh-huh!)
Oh baby oh oh baby (yeah)
바람아 더 불어다오 내게로
한 여름의 party tonight 뛰어 높이 가는 거야
Oh baby oh oh baby 하늘을 날자
늦바람 났어

Credit: allfordrama.com + xiaolink

Romanization

Oh G-dragon (A yo Great Park! mwohaeyo?)
Ttakhi (oneul pati inneunde gachi gallaeyo?)
Chaegimjil geoya? (Yeah)
Han beon norabolkka? (Yeah) chulbaar~

Oneul bam na baramnasseo chingu ttara gangnam gasseo
Yeoreumdo dagawasseuni wangjaga dorawasseo
Nado jedaero baramnasseo nolgo sipeo andal nasseo
Yeolgwangui dogani sin naneun bunwigi urin jigeum yadannasseo
Nan baramnasseo
Nan baramnasseo

Mimi mianhae eomma yongseohae eomma
Oneul bam jeonhwa da kkeo I’m on fire
Urin jom bappa hey minseo appa
Useobwa hahaha hahaha heopae baram chasseo huh
Nan baramnasseo
Nan baramnasseo

Oneul gateun saturday night (saturday night)
Michindeusi noneun geoya (uh-huh!)
Oh baby oh oh baby (yeah)
Barama deo bureodao naegero
Han yeoreumui party tonight ttwieo nopi ganeun geoya
Oh baby oh oh baby haneureul nalja

Let’s go let’s go let’s go let’s go let’s go come on!
Oneul bam tto baram nasseo chingu ttara gangbuk gasseo
UV neon itaewon gasseo? uri dureun hongdaee wasseo
Balbadage buri nasseo jeongsin nagan uriraseo
Taken from allfordrama.com
Na oraenmane mul mannasseo mulgogin jul arasseo
Maeryeogi neomchyeo seutail meotjyeo Swag Swag
Donghaedo beonjjeok seohaedo beonjjeok
Ireon namjadeul mannabwasseo? Swag~ urin baramnasseo
Urin baramnasseo
Urin baramnasseo
Urin baramnasseo

Oneul gateun saturday night (saturday night)
Michindeusi noneun geoya (uh-huh!)
Oh baby oh oh baby (yeah)
Barama deo bureodao naegero
Han yeoreumui party tonight ttwieo nopi ganeun geoya
Oh baby oh oh baby haneureul nalja
Neutbaram nasseo

Credit: allfordrama.com + latestvideolyrics



Translation



Oh~ g-dragon~ a-yo great park! whats up?
I’m home! i have a party to attend, you wanna come with?
For real? yeah~ party time?
Let’s go!

Tonight i’m ready to have fun, i followed my friend to kangnam
The summer has come and the prince has returned
I, too, am ready to have fun, i cant wait til we get to the party
Hot sensation, excited atmosphere, we’re eager
I’m ready to party, i’m ready to party

Sosososorry mom, forgive me mom
I have to turn my phone off and i’m on fire
Taken from allfordrama.com
We are kind of busy! hey, minsuh’s dad [myungsoo], laugh: hahahahaha!
Our lungs are full of laughs
We are ready to go
We are ready to party

Tonight together on a saturday night (saturday night)
We party like we’re crazy (ah ha)
Woo baby, woo woo baby
Wind, please blow me away
Party tonight on a mid summer night
Jump higher and we go
Woo baby woo woo baby
We fly in the sky
Lets go lets go lets go lets go lets go come on

Tonight, again, i’m ready to have fun, i followed by friend to kangbook
Uv, you went to leetaewon? we, us two, went to hongdae
My foot is on fire and the sanity left us
We were like a fish who met its water
We are full of attractiveness, we’re so stylish, swag swag
We’re on east coast, then we’re on west coast, have you seen any men like us?
Swag, we’re ready to go
We’re ready to have fun
We’re ready to party
We’re ready to go

Tonight together on a saturday night (saturday night)
We party like we’re crazy (ah ha)
Woo baby, woo woo baby
Wind, please blow me away
Party tonight on a mid summer night
Jump higher and we go
Woo baby woo woo baby
We fly in the sky
We’re late but ready to have fun

Credit: allfordrama.com + latestvideolyrics
